post.html: Is the cloud a fun place? Does the question even make sense? Is fun at work possible? As a consultant with the IBM Garage, Holly has seen fun in the cloud and … un-fun in the cloud. In this talk, she’ll share how to use fun as a guide to getting the most out of the cloud
